Breadth-First.Explanation: Opening statement with no specific hypothesis, initiating broad analysis.
General observation of the scene and intent to list key clues, divergent clue collection.
Listing architectural and signage clues without targeting a specific hypothesis, broad clue gathering.
Listing environmental details without narrowing to a specific location, continued broad clue gathering.

Depth-First.Explanation: Based on the SNCF signage and architectural details, a specific hypothesis (major French station, likely Paris) is proposed and analyzed in detail.
Depth-First.KeyElement: SNCF signage and resemblance to Gare de l'Est

Breadth-Depth Switch.Explanation: Shift from broad clue collection to focused hypothesis generation and verification upon recognizing key SNCF and architectural clues.
